recipes.label: A gleam of what was
recipes.startdescription: I've used a follower who carries the mark of the colours that were. The Suppression Bureau may hear of it.

recipes.label: The Ink-Eye Parlour
recipes.startdescription: This is the Ink-Eye. I can purchase tattooing implements here.

recipes.label: Purchase a tattoo kit?
recipes.startdescription: Ink-Eye sells tattoo kits for personal use. I can purchase one.
recipes.description: It is marked with their distinctive eye.

recipes.label: Purchase a couple of pigments?
recipes.startdescription: Ink-Eye sells occult pigments, although they're packed in non-descript bags. I can purchase some. A Bronze Spintria will buy a few, but neither I nor the vendor know what's inside.
recipes.description: The bag is sealed. I shouldn't open it until I get home.

recipes.label: Purchase several pigments?
recipes.startdescription: Ink-Eye sells occult pigments, although they're packed in non-descript bags. I can purchase some. A Silver Spintria will buy several, but neither I nor the vendor know what's inside.
recipes.description: The bag is sealed. I shouldn't open it until I get home.

recipes.label: Purchase a special pigment?
recipes.startdescription: Ink-Eye sells occult pigments, although they're packed in non-descript bags. I can purchase some. A Gold Spintria will buy something special, stored separately from 'normal' pigments. Perhaps I shouldn't purchase it in the first place.
recipes.description: The bag is sealed. I shouldn't open it until I get home.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Glory's light?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of Glory's maddening light.
recipes.description: Better not look too close.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of existential horror?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of a horrifying image.
recipes.description: The dark days of the soul, on this one's skin.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of a fleeting memory?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of a fleeting memory.
recipes.description: A day in their life.

recipes.label: Apply a wild pattern?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a wild, restlessness-induced pattern.
recipes.description: Soon, even I won't see any reason to this.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Mother of Ants?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Mother of Ants.
recipes.description: Saint Agnes, in her more horrifying form.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Meniscate?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Meniscate.
recipes.description: The moon, and her scar.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Ghirbi, the Head?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of Ghirbi, the Name who guards the Stag Door.
recipes.description: A golden head which cries lead.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Horned-Axe?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Horned-Axe.
recipes.description: A labrys in a doorway.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Beach-Crow?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Beach-Crow.
recipes.description: With one of his many treasures.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Meniscate?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Meniscate.
recipes.description: The moon, and her scar.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Watchman?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Watchman.
recipes.description: The one who guards the Glory.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the King Crucible?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as the King Crucible.
recipes.description: Fire and combustion, in a simple candle.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Sun-in-Rags?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Sun-in-Rags.
recipes.description: A sunset in blood.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Flowermaker?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Flowermaker.
recipes.description: A succulent lily.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Baldomerian?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as the Baldomerian.
recipes.description: A scholar's profile.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Ghirbi, the Head?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of Ghirbi, the Name who guards the Stag Door.
recipes.description: A golden head which cries lead.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the King Crucible?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as the King Crucible.
recipes.description: Fire and combustion, in a mere candle.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Forge of Days?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Forge of Days.
recipes.description: Another dawn, fresh out of the forge.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Lionsmith?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Lionsmith.
recipes.description: The Golden General, with his brigade of monsters.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Madrugad?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Madrugad.
recipes.description: The chilly dawn, the rising dead.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Ezeem?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as Ezeem, the Second Thirstly.
recipes.description: Blood that calls for change.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Amethyst Imago?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as the Amethyst Imago.
recipes.description: What is she, now?

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Hubris Glamore?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as Hubris Glamore.
recipes.description: His face unknown, his stories recorded.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Lionsmith?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Lionsmith.
recipes.description: The Golden General, with his brigade of monsters.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Colonel?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Colonel.
recipes.description: More scar than man.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Wolf-Divided?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Wolf-Divided.
recipes.description: Caput gerat lupinum.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Horned-Axe?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Horned-Axe.
recipes.description: A labrys in a doorway.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Sun-in-Rags?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Sun-in-Rags.
recipes.description: A sunset in blood.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Madrugad?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Madrugad.
recipes.description: The chilly dawn, the rising dead.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Wolf-Divided?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Wolf-Divided.
recipes.description: Caput gerat lupinum.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Elegiast?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Elegiast.
recipes.description: The Ivory Dove remembers.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Miss Naenia?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as Naenia.
recipes.description: The gentlest name of the Dove, just like on the painting.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Thunderskin?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Thunderskin.
recipes.description: In his ecstasic dance.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Witch-and-Sister?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Witch-and-Sister. [Use Vital Pigment and Geminate Invocation to tattoo Sister-and-Witch instead.]
recipes.description: The Sea-Twins, as they would wish to drown.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Velvet?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Velvet.
recipes.description: A mole in the Wood, with a secret she guards.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Beach-Crow?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Beach-Crow.
recipes.description: With one of his many treasures.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Flowermaker?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Flowermaker.
recipes.description: A succulent lily.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Ezeem?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as Ezeem, the Second Thirstly.
recipes.description: Blood that calls for change.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Sister-and-Witch?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Sister-and-Witch. [Use Rose-Pearl Dust and Thiatic Invocation to tattoo Witch-and-Sister instead.]
recipes.description: The Crossroad-Twins, as kites above the water.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Red Grail?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Red Grail.
recipes.description: Blood and birth and feast.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Malachite?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Malachite.
recipes.description: Rich gifts of honey.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Amethyst Imago?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as the Amethyst Imago.
recipes.description: What is she, now?

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Velvet?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Velvet.
recipes.description: A mole in the Wood, with a secret she guards.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Malachite?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Malachite.
recipes.description: Rich gifts of honey.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Moth?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Moth.
recipes.description: Scissors and cut hair.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Vagabond?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Vagabond.
recipes.description: Once, she will return to the Mansus.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Baldomerian?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as the Baldomerian.
recipes.description: A scholar's profile.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Hubris Glamore?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as Hubris Glamore.
recipes.description: His face unknown, his stories recorded.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Miss Naenia?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Name known as Naenia.
recipes.description: The gentlest name of the Dove, just like on the painting.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Vagabond?
recipes.startdescription: I can use these to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Vagabond.
recipes.description: Once, she will return to the Mansus.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Christopher Illopoly?
recipes.startdescription: A peculiar choice. Uncanny, even. Then again, he isn't called the world's only readable occultist for nothing.
recipes.description: Books are the memory which does not die. May his books be his immortality.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Seven-Coiled?
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, the Seven-Coiled was slain by the Colonel and the Mother of Ants. I can commemorate him with this act.
recipes.description: The monsters of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Tide
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, the Grail drained the Tide. I can commemorate it with this act.
recipes.description: The passions of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a Liminal tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: The world was different, long ago, when the Horned-Axe was not the only God-from-Stone. I can commemorate that change with this act.
recipes.description: The world that was.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Egg Unhatching?
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, the Egg Unhatching fled into the Glory to escape the Lithomachy. I can commemorate it with this act.
recipes.description: The sunlight of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Sun-in-Splendour?
recipes.startdescription: Noon, as they say, is not as it was. Before, it was different. I can commemorate the noon that was with this act.
recipes.description: The Glory of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Wheel?
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, the Wheel was usurped by the Moth. I can commemorate it with this act.
recipes.description: The world's heartbeat of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Old Wood?
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, the Wood was brighter. I can commemorate the Wood that was with this act.
recipes.description: The Wood of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Flint?
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, the Flint was surpassed by the Forge of Days. I can commemorate it with this act.
recipes.description: The works of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Carapace Cross?
recipes.startdescription: Long ago, we consumed our ancestry. I can commemorate it with this act.
recipes.description: The mankind of the past.

recipes.label: Apply a Secret Histories-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by a knot in the Histories. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: This never happened. This has definitely happened.

recipes.label: Apply a Knock-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Knock. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: A purple, serpent-shaped key.

recipes.label: Apply a Lantern-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Lantern. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: A few smudges of the brightest white.

recipes.label: Apply a Forge-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Forge. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: Rich oranges of a conflagration.

recipes.label: Apply a Edge-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Edge. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: Greenish blade which calls for strife.

recipes.label: Apply a Winter-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Winter. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: Snowfall.

recipes.label: Apply a Heart-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Heart. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: Vermillion heartbeat.

recipes.label: Apply a Grail-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Grail. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: Richest blood.

recipes.label: Apply a Moth-aspected Tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo touched by Moth. [With correct lore, this might be a more effective tattoo.]
recipes.description: Unclear swipes of unclear colour.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Mare-in-the-Tree?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the perilous Hour known as the Mare-in-the-Tree.
recipes.description: The more I look, the more unsettling this picture becomes.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Chandler?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the Hour that will be known as the Chandler.
recipes.description: Hers will be the light at dream's edge.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Blackbone?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the pelagic Hour known as the Blackbone.
recipes.description: This scene is not one a human can see - not hostile, but utterly alien.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Rising Spider?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the ambitious from-Nowhere Hour known as the Rising Spider.
recipes.description: Stark and ready to pounce.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Snow?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the forgotten Hour known as the Snow.
recipes.description: The rest is silence.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Crowned Growth?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the infective Hour known as the Crowned Growth. I will need a powerful protective incantation to avert its attention.
recipes.description: No. No. No. NO. NO. NO NO NO.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of Applebright?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the God-from-Nowhere known as Applebright.
recipes.description: Cheery. Deceptive.

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Egg?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the Hour known as the Egg, which used to be the Egg Unhatching.
recipes.description: Will it let us free?

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo of the Witness?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply a tattoo of the observant Hour known as the Witness.
recipes.description: Soon. Very soon.

recipes.label: Un-Painting
recipes.startdescription: 'No. Don't open it here.' [The owner will not allow you to tattoo her customers with this pigment.]

recipes.label: Lost Colours
recipes.startdescription: 'I know what you are thinking, but no, I cannot allow that. These memories are not for my clients. I don't want more trouble with the Suppression Bureau.' [The owner will not allow you to tattoo her customers with memories of lost things.]

recipes.label: Apply a tattoo?
recipes.startdescription: I can use this to apply tattoos. [Add Ink-Eye to work at there, or a follower to apply a tattoo to them.]

recipes.label: Work at the Ink-Eye?
recipes.startdescription: I can use my talents to work at the Ink-Eye. The owner will pay me at the end of the day, and compensate for the pigments expended. [This will pay better.]
recipes.description: The sun sets. I return home, at last, my payment in my pocket.

recipes.label: Work at the Ink-Eye?
recipes.startdescription: I can use my talents to work at the Ink-Eye. The owner will pay me at the end of the day. [This will pay better.]
recipes.description: The sun sets. I return home, at last, my payment in my pocket.

recipes.label: Work at the Ink-Eye?
recipes.startdescription: I can use my talents to work at the Ink-Eye. The owner will pay me at the end of the day, and compensate for the pigments expended. [This will pay better.]
recipes.description: The sun sets. I return home, at last, my payment in my pocket.

recipes.label: Work at the Ink-Eye?
recipes.startdescription: I can use my talents to work at the Ink-Eye. The owner will pay me at the end of the day. [This will pay better.]
recipes.description: The sun sets. I return home, at last, my payment in my pocket.

recipes.label: Work at the Ink-Eye?
recipes.startdescription: I can use my talents to work at the Ink-Eye. The owner will pay me at the end of the day, and compensate for the pigments expended.
recipes.description: The sun sets. I return home, at last, my payment in my pocket.

recipes.label: Work at the Ink-Eye?
recipes.startdescription: I can use my talents to work at the Ink-Eye. The owner will pay me at the end of the day.
recipes.description: The sun sets. I return home, at last, my payment in my pocket.
